attributes.action: Condemn the Israeli Government for continued aggression against Palestinian residents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is an endless list of similarities between Nazi Germany and Israel. The capturing of land and property, denying people access to educational opportunities and restricting access to earn a living to destroy their hope, all with the aim to chase people away from their land.

The Prime Minister needs to condemn the ongoing situation.
